sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; export const PrivateChat = () => { return ( <>
Chats > Private Chat
Aiden Chavez
Last seen: 2 hours ago

Pin Chat

Spam/Unspam

Delete Messages

  • 10:15 AM, Today
    Hi Aiden, how are you? How is the project coming along?
  • 10:12 AM, Today
    Are we meeting today?
  • 10:15 AM, Today
    Project has been already finished and I have results to show you.
) } export default PrivateChat;
